---
id: o-auth-token-endpoint
title: "Token URL"
description: "The code provided to the Redirect URI. Code can be exchanged for a ID Token containing the user details using the Token URL."

---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";

import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Token URL"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/oauth/token"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The code provided to the Redirect URI. Code can be exchanged for a ID Token containing the user details using the Token URL.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Query Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"description":"The code received by the Redirect URI as part of the Authentication Response.","name":"code","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"description":"The redirect URI where this code was received. This will used to validate the code to make the code was infact generated for this redirect_uri","name":"redirect_uri","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"description":"Used in PKCE flow, a `code_challenge` presented at the Authorization Endpoint","name":"code_verifier","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>

          Code validated Successfuly
